participant_1.name: Mike Johnson
participant_1.personality: Nostalgic and community-oriented, Mike enjoys reminiscing about the past and has a strong sense of empathy.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Laura Smith
participant_2.personality: Energetic and fun-loving, Laura has a passion for dance and enjoys expressing herself through music.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s.
